description: Hibernian 2-3 St Mirren: Have your say
title: Hibernian 2-3 St Mirren: Have your say
title_page: Hibernian 2-3 St Mirren: Have your say - BBC Sport
maintext:
Hibernian got off to the worst possible start to the Premiership season as they lost at home to St Mirren.
Were you at Easter Road, or watch on TV? Either way, give us your thoughts here.
